attributes.title: Anonymous Letter to Uncle Sammi
attributes.review:
Uncle Sam, 

The first night at bed when you left, Don made out with 2 girls and put his head between a cocktail waitress's breasts. Also was grinding with multiple fat women.

When you left crying at klutch, Ron was holding hands and dancing with a female and took down her number. 

Multiple people in the house know, therefore you should know the truth.

attributes.title: Complete Censorship
attributes.review:
It’s appalling that this is within the top 3 apps for news yet it fails to cover many news stories.

How blind can people to follow a man who is so despicable?

attributes.title: almost as disgusting as him
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and had a ton of problems right off the bat it didn't download right, the app crashed multiple times, nothing would load, it was all american propaganda sugar coated with some narcissism. this app is horrible and no one should download it unless they want to be scammed this november :)
